## Runtime.ResourceResolverCacheMetricsListener class

A metrics implementation of [Runtime.IResourceResolverCacheListener](./ts-res.runtime.iresourceresolvercachelistener.md) that tracks hit counts and rates across all cache types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ResourceResolverCacheMetricsListener<TM extends ICacheMetrics> implements IResourceResolverCacheListener 
```
**Implements:** [IResourceResolverCacheListener](./ts-res.runtime.iresourceresolvercachelistener.md)
